package.name: BluetoothRestarter
package.shortDescription: Restarts bluetooth after every respring in order to fix notifications on bluetooth devices not working.

descriptionlist.description:
BluetoothRestarter is meant to be used if you are experiencing problems with not recieving notifications on bluetooth devices after doing a respring.
It works by turning airplane mode on for 3 seconds and turns it back off right after the device resprings.
This should cause bluetooth to turn off and turn back on, which fixes the issue.

BluetoothRestarter is a tweak available on both rootless and rootful jailbreaks.
